alert.note: Alert for Bay (Florida) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued June 09 at 3:20PM EDT until June 09 at 4:00PM EDT by NWS Tallahassee
info.description: The National Weather Service in Tallahassee has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Central Bay County in the Panhandle of Florida... * Until 300 PM CDT. * At 220 PM CDT, a severe thunderstorm was located near Lynn Haven, moving southeast at 20 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts and penny size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Expect damage to roofs, siding, and trees. * Locations impacted include... Panama City, Lynn Haven, Panama City Beach, Callaway, Springfield, Hiland Park, Tyndall Air Force Base, Parker, St Andrews State Park, Southport, Cedar Grove, Dirego Park, Beacon Beach, College Station, Bayou George, West Panama City, Biltmore Beach, Brannonville, Millville and Vicksburg. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...0.75 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
